subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Leading by 1 up and with Christie Kerr facing a 10-foot birdie attempt on the 18th hole, Suzann Pettersen curled in a left to-right 15-footer for birdie to seal her first victory in 20 months.
snippet: Leading by 1 up and with Christie Kerr facing a 10-foot birdie attempt on the 18th hole, Suzann Pettersen curled in a left to-right 15-footer for birdie to seal her first victory in 20 months.
